Package index

All functions

coe_census()
Get census data for the Church of England at a parish, diocesan or national level.
coe_census_datasets()
Browse all available datasets of ONS census 2021 data
coe_census_diocese()
Obtain diocese-level census statistics on a given topic
coe_census_england()
Obtain national level census statistics on a given topic
coe_census_parish()
Obtain parish-level census statistics on a given topic
coe_churches()
Get data on the Anglican geography on Church of England Churches, including their parish, benefice, arcdeaconry and diocese.
coe_esri_fields()
View fields that can be passed to the where argument of coe_churches()
coe_parish_deprivation() coe_parish_imd()
Get parish-level deprivation data from the Church of England
coe_parish_from_church()
Get the parish codes of any number of Church of England churches.
coe_parish_snapshot()
Get a list of comparative table(s) of local, diocesan and national data for a given parish
ns_sec_descriptions
National statistics socio-economic classification levels

Developed by Dave Lovell.
